name: 3d shooter final
description:
This is my 3d shooter project 

one the main menu I added to the environment to make the main menu look better.

on level one I also added to the environment as well as adding many enemies to fight as well as enemy spawners. 

level 2 I added to the terrain making the map more narrow also level 2 is the boss fight with the hive enemy. 

created by Nathan Pauls
